languages.text: Shoots a ray dealing {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, the target suffers <u>(from 20 to 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(from 36 to 48)</u> damage and suffers the flesh degradation {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Стреляет лучом, наносящим {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненный урон{/g}. Цель, получившая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае успеха цель получает <u>(от 20 до 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. При провале цель получает <u>(от 36 до 48)</u> урона, а также {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g} луч разложения на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Shoots a ray dealing {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. On hit the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, the target suffers 20-32 Damage. If failed, the target suffers 36-48 damage and suffers the flesh degradation {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effect{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

Shoots a ray dealing {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, the target suffers <u>(from 20 to 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(from 36 to 48)</u> damage and suffers the flesh degradation {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

Shoots a ray dealing {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, the target suffers <u>(from 20 to 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(from 36 to 48)</u> damage and suffers the flesh degradation {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: Стреляет лучом, наносящим {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненный урон{/g}. Цель, получившая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае успеха цель получает <u>(от 20 до 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. При провале цель получает <u>(от 36 до 48)</u> урона, а также {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g} луч разложения на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火災被害{/g}を与える光線を発射する。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した場合、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。合格した場合、ターゲットは<u>20～32</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。失格した場合、ターゲットは<u>36～48</u>のダメージを受け、3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、肉体の劣化の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: Shoots a ray dealing {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, the target suffers <u>(from 20 to 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(from 36 to 48)</u> damage and suffers the flesh degradation {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を与える光線を発射する。命中した場合、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に合格しなければならない。合格した場合、ターゲットは20～32のダメージを受ける。失格した場合、ターゲットは36～48のダメージを受け、3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、肉体の劣化の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}マイナス効果{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: 射出一道射线，造成{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若目标通过检定，则会受到<u>20-32</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会受到<u>36-48</u>点伤害，并受到“肉体退化”{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}影响，持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: Shoots a ray dealing {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, the target suffers <u>(from 20 to 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(from 36 to 48)</u> damage and suffers the flesh degradation {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 射出一道射线，造成{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若目标通过检定，则会受到<u>20-32</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会受到<u>36-48</u>点伤害，并受到“肉体退化”{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}影响，持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Dispara un rayo que inflige {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g}. Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g}, el objetivo realiza una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. Si la supera, recibe <u>(de 20 a 32)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. Si la falla, sufre <u>(de 36 a 48)</u> de daño y el {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efecto negativo{/g} degeneración cárnica durante 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text: Shoots a ray dealing {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, the target suffers <u>(from 20 to 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(from 36 to 48)</u> damage and suffers the flesh degradation {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Dispara un rayo que inflige {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g}. El objetivo realiza una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. Si la supera, recibe 20-32 de daño. Si la falla, sufre 36-48 de daño y el {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efecto negativo{/g} degeneración cárnica durante 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

languages.text: Feuert Strahl ab, der {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} verursacht. Das {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g} bestehen. Im Erfolgsfall erleidet das Ziel <u>(20 bis 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Scheitert die Probe, erleidet das Ziel <u>(36 bis 48)</u> Schaden und wird 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekt{/g} "Fleischzerfall" belegt.
languages.original_text: Shoots a ray dealing {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, the target suffers <u>(from 20 to 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(from 36 to 48)</u> damage and suffers the flesh degradation {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Schießt einen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} verursachenden Strahl. Das getroffene Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen. Bei Bestehen erleidet das Ziel 20-32 Schaden. Bei Nichtbestehen erleidet das Ziel 36-48 Schaden und erleidet 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang den {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negativen Effekt{/g} Fleischzerfall.

languages.text: Tire un rayon qui inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g}. Si elle est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g}, la cible doit passer un {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Endurance{/g}. Si elle réussit ce test, elle subit <u>(de 20 à 32)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. Si elle échoue, elle subit <u>(de 36 à 48)</u> points de dégâts et {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}l'effet négatif{/g} Dégradation de la chair pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Shoots a ray dealing {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If passed, the target suffers <u>(from 20 to 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(from 36 to 48)</u> damage and suffers the flesh degradation {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tire un rayon qui inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g}. Si elle est touchée, la cible doit passer un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}. Si elle réussit ce test, elle subit 20 à 32 points de dégâts. Si elle échoue, elle subit 36 à 48 points de dégâts et l'{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effet négatif{/g} Dégradation de la Chair pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
